metadata.title: CVE-2015-8862 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: mustache package before 2.2.1 for Node.js allows remote attackers toconduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by leveraging a template with anattribute that is not quoted.

criterions.comment: mustache.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
